    • Method Detail

      • click

        public java.lang.String click(int x,
                     int y)
        Click is the main event in mouse handler, takes in the x and y co-ordinates of the mouse
        Parameters:
        x - co-ordinate of the mouse
        y - co-ordinate of the mouse
        Returns:
        a string of what container has been clicked in. If no container is clicked, returns null
